TopicTitle: SAS and Control Surfaces Not functioning as intended

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: I7-11700k | GPU: 2080ti Founders Edition | RAM: 32Gb

 

When in stable flight (in a spaceplane) with SAS enabled, when crossing 320m/s speed threshold vessel suddenly attempts to compensate for roll when no roll inputs or aerodynamic forces are being applied, causing wild shaking and erratic SAS behavior. Also, a lack of a "reset SAS heading" functionality (tapping F to reset heading in KSP1) seems to be missing. Overall stability assist system overhaul seems to be in order for long term viability of spaceplane style SSTO craft, or even long term viability of regular airplanes.
